description:
This is a market on the total sales that will be generated by the Cryptopunks auction at Christie’s, scheduled to take place starting on May 11, 2021. This market will resolve to 
“Yes” if the total value of all the items sold during the CryptoPunks auction exceeds $20 million. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. Total sales will only include primary sales, and not any sales on secondary markets. The market will resolve according to official sales as available on Christie’s (https://www.christies.com/lot/lot--6316969/) or credible reports of the total sales figures. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, this market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

events.title: Will total sales exceed $20M for the Cryptopunks auction at Christie’s?
